unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a lifesaver! Lost my entire bajra crop in Rajasthan on 20/07/2023 due to untimely rains. Applied through Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana. The process was a bit slow initially, had to visit the SBI branch in Jaipur on 27/07/2023 at 11:00 AM. But finally got Rs. 10,000 compensation. Helped me sow again for Diwali, maybe harvest will be good on 14/11/2023. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a lifesaver! Lost my entire bajra crop in Rajasthan on twentieth july two thousand and twenty three due to untimely rains. Applied through P M F B Y. The process was a bit slow initially, had to visit the S B I branch in Jaipur on twenty seventh july two thousand and twenty three at eleven A M. But finally got rupee ten thousand compensation. Helped me sow again for Diwali, maybe harvest will be good on fourteenth november two thousand and twenty three. Jai Kisan!
